entity.title: Accounts Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of accounts. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the account dimension record

field.name: partyName
field.description: Name of the account. From PartyRoleAndPartyDetail. Dependent on PartyTypeId

entity.title: Assets Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of assets. The natural key is [fixedAssetId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Asset dimension record

entity.title: Carriers Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of carriers. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Carrier dimension record

field.name: partyName
field.description: Name of the carrier. From PartyRoleAndPartyDetail. Dependent on PartyTypeId

entity.title: Countries Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of countries. The natural key is [countryId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

field.name: countryId
field.description: The country id (natural key). The ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the Country

field.name: countryCode
field.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the Country

field.name: countryNumCode
field.description: The ISO 3166-1 numeric code of the Country

field.name: countryTeleCode
field.description: The country calling code of the Country

field.name: tld
field.description: The country code top-level domain of the Country

entity.title: Currencies Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of currencies. The natural key is [currencyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Currency dimension record

entity.title: Customers Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of customers. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Customer dimension record

field.name: partyName
field.description: Name of the customer. From PartyRoleAndPartyDetail. Dependent on PartyTypeId

entity.title: Dates Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of dates. The natural key is [dateValue]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Date dimension record

field.name: dayName
field.description: The name of the day (Monday, Tuesday, etc...)

field.name: dayOfMonth
field.description: The number of the day in the month

field.name: dayOfYear
field.description: The number of the day in the year

field.name: monthName
field.description: The name of the month (January, February, etc...)

field.name: weekOfMonth
field.description: The number of the week in the month

field.name: weekOfYear
field.description: The number of the week in the year

entity.title: Employees Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of employees. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Employee dimension record

field.name: partyName
field.description: Name of the employee. From PartyRoleAndPartyDetail. Dependent on PartyTypeId

entity.title: Facilities Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of facilities. The natural key is [facilityId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

entity.title: Internal Organisations Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of internal (accounting) parties. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

entity.title: PoS Terminals Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of PoS terminals. The natural key is [posTerminalId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the PosTerminal dimension record

field.name: terminalName
field.description: The name given to the terminal

entity.title: Products Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of Products. The natural key is [productId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Product dimension record

field.name: internalName
field.description: The internal name of the product

field.name: brandName
field.description: The brand name of the prdouct

entity.title: Projects Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of projects. The natural key is [workEffortId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Project dimension record

field.name: projectName
field.description: Name of the project. From WorkEffort.workEffortName

entity.title: Project Tasks Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of project tasks. The natural key is [workEffortId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the ProjectTask dimension record

field.name: projectTaskName
field.description: Name of the project task. From WorkEffort.workEffortName

entity.title: Sales Channels Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of sales channels. The natural key is [enumId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

entity.title: Sales Promotions Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of sales promotions. The natural key is [productPromoId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

field.name: salesPromoName
field.description: Name of the promo. From ProductPromo.promoName.

entity.title: Stores Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of stores. The natural key is [productStoreId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

field.name: storeName
field.description: Name of the store. From ProductStore.storeName.

entity.title: Suppliers Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of suppliers. The natural key is [partyId]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the Supplier dimension record

field.name: partyName
field.description: Name of the supplier. From PartyRoleAndPartyDetail. Dependent on PartyTypeId

entity.title: Times Dimension
entity.description: Dimension of time slots. The natural key is [hh:mm]

field.name: dimensionId
field.description: Unique identifier of the dimension record

entity.title: Purchase Invoice Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with invoice item grain for purchase invoices

field.name: invoiceId
field.description: The invoice Id. A degenerate dimension

field.name: invoiceItemSeqId
field.description: The invoice line item. A degenerate dimension

field.name: orderId
field.description: The associated order. A degenerate dimension

field.name: extGrossAmount
field.description: Extended gross amount: quantity invoiced multiplied by the list unit price.

field.name: extNetAmount
field.description: Extended net amount: gross amount less discounts.

field.name: contributionAmount
field.description: Extended net amount less all the costs.

entity.title: Purchase Order Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with order item grain for purchase orders.

field.name: orderId
field.description: The order id. A degenerate dimension

field.name: orderItemSeqId
field.description: The order line item. A degenerate dimension

field.name: extGrossAmount
field.description: Extended gross amount: quantity item multiplied by the unit price.

field.name: extGrossCost
field.description: Extended gross cost: quantity item multiplied by the last price.

field.name: extNetAmount
field.description: Extended net amount: gross amount less discounts.

field.name: GS
field.description: Gross Sales: Gross Amount plus Shipping Amount.

field.name: GMP
field.description: Gross Merchandize Profit: Gross Merchandize Sales less Gross Cost.

field.name: GSP
field.description: Gross Shipping Profit: Gross Shipping Sales less Gross Shipping Cost.

field.name: GP
field.description: Gross Profit: Gross Merchandize Profit less Gross Shipping Profit.

entity.title: Sales Invoice Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with invoice item grain for sales invoices.

field.name: invoiceId
field.description: The invoice Id. A degenerate dimension

field.name: invoiceItemSeqId
field.description: The invoice line item. A degenerate dimension

field.name: orderId
field.description: The associated order. A degenerate dimension

field.name: extGrossAmount
field.description: Extended gross amount: quantity invoiced multiplied by the list unit price.

field.name: extNetAmount
field.description: Extended net amount: gross amount less discounts.

field.name: contributionAmount
field.description: Extended net amount less all the costs.

entity.title: Sales Order Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with order item grain for sales orders.

field.name: orderId
field.description: The order id. A degenerate dimension

field.name: orderItemSeqId
field.description: The order line item. A degenerate dimension

field.name: extGrossAmount
field.description: Extended gross amount: quantity item multiplied by the unit price.

field.name: extGrossCost
field.description: Extended gross cost: quantity item multiplied by the last price.

field.name: extNetAmount
field.description: Extended net amount: gross amount less discounts.

field.name: GS
field.description: Gross Sales: Gross Amount plus Shipping Amount.

field.name: GMP
field.description: Gross Merchandize Profit: Gross Merchandize Sales less Gross Cost.

field.name: GSP
field.description: Gross Shipping Profit: Gross Shipping Sales less Gross Shipping Cost.

field.name: GP
field.description: Gross Profit: Gross Merchandize Profit less Gross Shipping Profit.

entity.title: Inventory Item Fact
entity.description: A transaction fact entity with inventory items.

view-entity.title: Purchase Invoice Item Star Schema
view-entity.description: Invoice Item star schema regarding Purchase Orders .

view-entity.title: Purchase Order Item Star Schema
view-entity.description: Order Item star schema regarding Purchase Orders.

view-entity.title: Sales Invoice Item Star Schema
view-entity.description: Invoice Item star schema regarding Sales Invoices.

view-entity.title: Sales Order Item Star Schema
view-entity.description: Order Item star schema regarding Sales Orders.
